Name: 100 hidden snails 2
About the game: Art by Anatoliy Loginovskikh Important information Press 'N' for night mode. Press 'Del' then 'Esc' to reset all achievements. 100 hidden snails 2 is a hidden object game in a surreal setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Can you find 100 snails? Just click on the snail! Good Luck!
